column5: Hi everyone My freind wants to get his dad a gps fish finder so what would everyone recommend he will want something entry level he only really fishes 2 lake in the kawarthas Thanks for the input
Does anyone have the Eagle  FishElite 502C GPS?

I have a Lowrance X67c that is a great little machine. It's about middle of the road for price but works well in the Kawarthas for me. Then in the winter I convert it over to portable for the hardwater season.
i have a lowrance 339igps.    its an internal antenae and is a very powerful unit.go to the lowrance website and check the different units out...they is one to fit every price range    good luck
